divs: Sighting DetailsHi there. I've never had an occurrence of actually witnessing a UFO before. Usually I find a logical explanation for things flying around in the night sky however, this I could not explain. In the vicinity of imperial hwy and Kellogg Dr in the Anaheim Hills area of southern California I saw quite an interesting sight tonight. The craft was clearly a triangle shape and had 3 lights that looked immensely similar to a stealth fighter however, these lights were LED in appearance. The front of the craft had a red non-blinking light. The center of the craft had a surging light that evenly distributed itself to the 3 LED lights. The aircraft circled and hovered doing figure 8s and coasting the tree line for about 5-10mins. No sound. Height im not sure of but possibly the same of a plane at a low, safe flying elevation. My first guest was a drone but the surging light is what was the interesting part and the LED which I'm not aware of any craft having. I am wondering if u have any records or pictures for me to look at to see if u have any similar cases? Unfortunately I did not have my camera with me. I'm curious to know what I saw tonight. Kind regards, Andrew
Summary: Looked like a stealth fighter or tr-3b
